basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I am a Computer Science student, self-taught, and fluent in English, with practical experience in Artificial Intelligence and software development. My academic journey, combined with my curiosity, has led me to explore various technologies independently, always seeking to learn and apply new tools that can positively impact the world around us. I have solid skills in development with Next.js, Django, and Node.js, as well as advanced knowledge in AI techniques such as Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning, and Computer Vision. I stay up to date with the latest tech trends because I believe that innovation and continuous learning are essential for success in the IT field. I am looking for an internship opportunity where I can apply and expand my skills, collaborate with an innovative team, and contribute to creating solutions that generate real impact. I am committed to my professional growth and excited to join a team that shares the vision of driving transformation through technology.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
